resources.string: The overlay permission is required in order to show Auto Clicker interface over the applications you want to automate, allowing you to configure your scenario without stopping the other application.
Enable Accessibility Services for Auto Clicker to automate clicks in other apps.
Enable this permission to run the app in background under ultra power saving mode.
Optional: Shows the notification while the application is running in order to easily return to the scenario selection screen.
This permission is mandatory for Auto Clicker.It won\'t be able to work correctly without it.

Tap the “Grant Permission” button and
1. Find “Install service” in settings
2. Find “Auto Clicker”
3. Enable the permission
